evidence.text:
Person B: Did I tell you what happened to Rishi?
Person B: He shit his pants during practice and then someone was like -- Yo Rishi...did you shit your pants? -- and he was like -- Oh man, guys, you won’t believe this!!! My mom pranked me! She put poop in my pants again!!
Person B: We were all like...your mom put poop in your pants? And then he just started bawling.
Person B: My mom cooks hella kimchi-jjigae and like radish and ox bone soup. The classics.

Person B: ...so Hardeep starts pissing in the river, and Wang-Wang starts filming him, right? Then later that day, he uploads it to YouTube and titles it, Hardeep Pissing In The River, and he sends it to us and we’re like - yeah, that shit go. Then a few days later, I get a call from Hardeep and he’s like - Brehhh, can you tell your boy to take that video of me pissing down? My dad saw it and he’s fuckin’ heated, cuh.

Person B: Well? What you gonna say?
Person B: Cause we actually have game. Jade said I was the hottest Indian she’s ever met.
Person A: I thought you weren’t Indian, HMM?
Person B: I’m not. But if I was I’d be the hottest one.

Person A: Bitch! Bitch! Bitch!
Person A: Hi Nai Nai!
